## Tasks

## Definition of Ready

- [ ] Reviewed by engineering
- [ ] Doesn't have unmet dependencies
- [ ] Description is clear and concise
- [ ] Has tasks that make it estimable
- [ ] Small enough to be doable in 2 days max
- [ ] Acceptance criteria is provided and clear
